instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1534 2015 Screen issue
threads.message: Got some weird anomalies on the screen with ghosting is this a display issue or logic board ?

threads.title: A1534 2015 Screen issue
threads.message: I know i should have checked external image but it completely slipped my mind i removed the charge port at the moment to use in another machine, Just wondering if anyone seen this before?

threads.title: A1534 2015 Screen issue
threads.message:
Never saw that...

External monitor will help in this case.
You can also try another USB OSX, just in case.

Do PRAM reset too.
